mapper.sql: staff.id as id, profile.first_name as employeeFirstName, profile.last_name as employeeLastName, profile.country_code as telCountryCode, profile.tel_number as telephone, profile.email as email, dept.id as deptId, dept.name as deptName, role.id as positionId, role.role_name as positionName, profile.birthday as birthday, profile.join_date as entryDate, profile.address_country_code as addressCountryCode, profile.address as address, profile.certificate_type as certificateType, profile.certificate_positive_annex as positivePicture, profile.certificate_negative_annex as negativePicture, profile.picture as avatar from ope_sys_user user inner join ope_sys_staff staff on user.id = staff.sys_user_id left join ope_sys_user_profile profile on user.id = profile.sys_user_id and profile.dr = 0 left join ope_sys_dept dept on user.dept_id = dept.id and dept.dr = 0 left join ope_sys_user_role urole on urole.user_id = user.id left join ope_sys_role role on role.id = urole.role_id and role.dr = 0
mapper.select: select rela.descendant from ope_sys_dept_relation rela where 1 = 1 and rela.ancestor =#{id}

select dept.id as id, dept.name as name from ope_sys_dept dept where dept.dr = 0 and dept.level !=0
and dept.id in
#{item}
order by id asc
